channel.title: How to use an emote with a command?
channel.description: Like when you would say ::lol it would play the green cloud emote or what ever. I have a list of emotes/graphics, but what would I put and where?

item.title: How to use an emote with a command?
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

stillgfx(XXX, absX, absY);
playerGfx(XXX);
staticAnimation(stuff);
^whatever void you got or wanna use

Read full topic
item.source: How to use an emote with a command?
